ygData.subject: What class does GZ play?
ygData.msgSnippet: I m hoping to finally hit level 50 within the next week or so, and I decided to do a little reading up on other classes to see if there s something else I d
ygData.messageBody:
I'm hoping to finally hit level 50 within the next week or so, and I decided
to do a little reading up on other classes to see if there's something else
I'd like to play. I was on the Shaman's Crucible, and came across an
interview they had with GZ. Found this question interesting. . .

TSC: Alright, now time to take that mask off... What class/race are you
currently having the most fun playing?
GZ: I have got to say that I love my 1/2 elf Bard - but mostly because when
I play, I am a very social player. Bards are good at being social. In fact,
I built them to be so. This is my current one - I have played a lot of EQ,
and tend to change my opinion every few weeks.


Elwyn Heartstring
Level 48 Bard
Erollisi Marr
